channel.title: 525 Npc Help!
channel.description:
Hey, I am using HYBRID PVP source and it is a 525. I am trying to find the NPC ID for "Nomad" and move him. But the ID for "Nomad" is no where. I looked in client. java, NPC. cfg. He has a shop ID tho, i just cant find his ID and I need it so i can move him.
Shops. cfg for your help: shop = 29 Pk_point_shop 2 2 1038 1 1040 1 1042 1 1044 1 1046 1 1048 1 1050 1 1053 1 1055 1 1057 1 18349 1 18351 1 18353 1 18355 1 18357 1 18359 1 18360 He is shop 29. Thanks :)

item.title: 525 Npc Help!
item.dc:creator: @owwch_u_died owwch u died
item.description:
@owwch_u_died wrote:

Hey, I am using HYBRID PVP source and it is a 525.
I am trying to find the NPC ID for “Nomad” and move him.
But the ID for “Nomad” is no where. I looked in client. java, NPC. cfg.
He has a shop ID tho, i just cant find his ID and I need it so i can move him.

Shops. cfg for your help:
shop = 29 Pk_point_shop 2 2 1038 1 1040 1 1042 1 1044 1 1046 1 1048 1 1050 1 1053 1 1055 1 1057 1 18349 1 18351 1 18353 1 18355 1 18357 1 18359 1 18360
He is shop 29.
Thanks
